description.value:
Trigger A creature of size Small or larger steps into an affected square or is standing on a square that becomes a sinkhole

Effect The ground beneath the creature gives way. The creature must attempt a @Check[reflex|dc:18] Save.

Critical Success The creature is able to move to an adjacent square.

Success The creature grabs an edge.

Failure The creature falls into the pit and lands @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Prone]. It takes @Damage[5[bludgeoning]|options:fall-damage] damage. Due to roots in the pit wall, it is easy to climb out of, requiring only a @Check[type:athletics|dc:13] check.

details.description: The area has become unstable as part of the swamp is pulled into another plane, causing sinkholes to spontaneously form.
details.disable: @Check[type:arcana,nature,thievery|dc:18] (trained) three times to counter the planar energies.

publication.title: Pathfinder Society Quest #22: Friends in Need

details.routine: (3 actions) On its turn each round, two new 10-foot-square sinkholes, 10 feet deep, randomly appear on the map. Until a creature of size Small or larger steps in the area of one, it looks no different than the surrounding area. If a creature takes an action to seek and succeeds at a @Check[perception|dc:18] check, it notices the hazardous square.
